## Project Overview

Led the strategic vision and development of a 2,000 sq. ft. makerspace in South LA. Authored the master plan, floor plan, and phased implementation strategy, collaborating with Urban TXT leadership to create a studio that scales with program growth and teaches the tech skills local youth need to thrive.

To see more, <a href="https://www.instagram.com/stories/highlights/17927381819233189/?hl=en">visit our Instagram highlights</a> or visit us at <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/search/?api=1&query=2318+S+Union+Ave,+Los+Angeles">2318 S Union Ave, Los Angeles</a> weekdays 10am - 5pm.

## Skills Developed

-   Human-Centered Space Design
-   Equipment & Furniture Specification
-   Community Engagement & Stakeholder Alignment
-   Scalable Curriculum Development
-   Strategic Planning for the Future of Learning
